name: Vibe Manacles
description:
VibeFixer is a worldwide BLESSING during the arduous days of self-isolation! This mental health program was endorsed by the government.

Are your vibes contorted?

Well, then you're in good hands. VibeFixer provides a euphoric experience to those who desire instant gratification! On the contrary, an individual can get addicted and become stressed. We value every second you spend in our application-- even minute sessions.

Oh, but don't worry. You aren't alone in this endeavor to fulfill your vibes! Valkyrie, our exquisite tutor, is going to assist you with a buoyant personality. She anticipates working with each and every one of her clients.

Looks like you're next on the conveyor belt.
